snippet: A Foreign Ministry spokeswoman said Chris Buckley’s visa application had been filed incorrectly and foreign news outlets were to blame for his departure from mainland China.
abstract: China's Foreign Ministry says New York Times reporter Chris Buckley was forced to leave mainland China because his visa application had been filed incorrectly.
lead_paragraph: A Foreign Ministry spokeswoman said Chris Buckley’s visa application had been filed incorrectly and foreign news outlets were to blame for his departure from mainland China.

headline.seo: China Says Reporter for The Times Was Not Expelled
headline.main: Reporter Forced to Leave China Had Problem With Visa, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Reporter Forced to Leave China Had Problem With Visa, Officials Say
